synopsis.text: Talented yet accident-prone Japanese rally driver Gen Todoroki catches the attention of a major car company seeking to sponsor a driver for the upcoming Safari Rally Kenya championship. Though allured by the opportunity, Todoroki knows the road to victory will be arduous. A slew of skilled international competitors stand ready to challenge his bid for the title, promising thrilling head-to-head showdowns along the way. Todoroki joins the Seiyo racing squad, partnering with French navigator Rov Row. Together they set out to prove their mettle against rally racing's best and claim the Safari Rally crown. Their journey plays out in this late 80s manga adaptation brimming with automotive action. Buckle up for a bumpy ride alongside Todoroki and Row as the checkered flag beckons the duo towards destiny.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
